import React from "react"; import FormattedDate from "./FormattedDate"; import FormattedTime from "./FormattedTime"; import WeatherIcon from "./WeatherIcon"; import UnitConversion from "./UnitConversion"; export default function display(props) { return (

{props.data.city}

{props.data.description}
  • {props.data.humidity} %
{/*
  • {props.data.humidity} %
  • {props.data.wind} Km/h
*/}
); }
